Peter Nygard Pour Femme Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.1650

Peter Nygard Women EDP is perfect to wear on any occasion because of its versatility in fragrance. Its top note contains ocean breeze accord and lime while its bottom note has musk amber and driftwood. It has hint of succulent mango tiare and tropical. It is a complete perfume with variable fragrances to enliven your mood.
